name: Handsome Turnip
description:
Handsome Turnip You play as a handsome turnip trying to restore the mother tree after vicious Yoinklings (enemies) have set it on fire. You must retry over and over until you're powerful enough to collect enough droplets to restore the mother tree. Survive the timer to proceed to the next level. Controls: (Mouse and Keyboard)
  • WASD to move
  • Left click to Shoot
  • E to interact

PS. Game may have some balancing issues due to sadly running out of time. We did not have enough time to add menus either.

Original Soundtrack by Mooz:

https://youtu.be/s3hL9chHiNg
